results.title: Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ mitigated peribronchiolar @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Blister</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001768 @@@pulmonary bullae@@@ formed in the smoke-exposed lungs with @DISEASE_Weight_Gain @DISEASE_MESH:D015430 @@@weight gain@@@ as compared to the smoking @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (P < 0.05).

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Jiang X, Zhang L, Wang L, Li Z, Sun W. Simvastatin mitigates functional and structural impairment of lung and right ventricle in a rat model of cigarette smoke-induced COPD. Int J Clin Exp Pathol. 2014;7(12):8553-62. PMID: 25674219
